name: Fairy Mahjong - Puzzle Game
description:
Fairy Mahjong is a highly innovative and addictive, skill-based, unique solitaire game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun games on the Apple App Store.

Fairy Mahjong combines mahjongg and match three game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.
Playing Fairy Mahjong is very simple: find and match three of identical tiles. Match all tiles to complete a board.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements
